head.supplied: Melbourne bot. Garden, ¶ 24/12/69. ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ In compliance with the request, conveyed in Mr Agg's letter of yesterday, ¶ received by me only this afternoon, I have the honor to transmit to you herew...

div.p: U69/27896, unit 750, VPRS 44/P inward registered and unregistered correspondence, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

In compliance with the request, conveyed in Mr Agg's letter of yesterday,
can this be found?
received by me only this afternoon, I have the honor to transmit to you herewith a statement in reference to the anticipated expenditure in the botanic Garden and scientific institutions connected therewith during 1870.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Salary of the Gov. Botanist and Director of the botanic Garden

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Salary and Wages to Office Clerk, Operator in the Laboratory, travelling Collector, Carpenter, Gardeners, Engine driver, Painter, Messenger, Labourers, Gardenboys

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Purchase of such plants and seeds as are not available by interchanges

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Expense connected with the publication of works on Australian plants and on industrial objects

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Stores, Stationery for Office, Paper for Museum, Timber, Drainpipes, Waterpipes, Chemicals for the Laboratory, Canvass for roofs of Conservatories and nursery beds, Glass, Tiles, Fuel for greenhouses Conservatories, forcing pits, and Steamengine

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Forage for two carthorses, food for waterbirds & singingbirds and some other Garden animals

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Transit and incidental expenses for minor repairs

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Purchase of the large Sonderian Museum Collections, as explained for a series of years past

div.p: I have the honor to be,

The honorable the President of the Board of Land & Works
